game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
A fork of "What is This? UwU" by Rotfuchs-von-Vulpes.

This mod says at the top of your screen what you're looking at in real time, which mod it belongs to and what tool to use in the block.

## Why use this over the original?

1. Different look
2. Shows the best tool to use
3. More options (such as changing the spacing and appending itemname

## Chatcommands

To unshow the pop-up, type this in console:

```
/wituwu
```

Retype to show it again.
name: what_is_this_uwu
short_description: A fork of "What is This? UwU" by Rotfuchs-von-Vulpes.
title: What Is This UwU (Forked)
